Message.Title: Nice day here, headed across the street to play a few holes
Message.Msg: Golf Course Update: The golf course is now open, and all greens are in play. The 4th hole is looking great, and the hope is to have it back in play within a couple of months. Until then we will be playing the practice hole to make the round a full 18 holes. We are now allowing golf carts on the golf course cart paths only. We will keep the membership informed as to any changes in these restrictions. The driving range is also open, and all are welcome to hit off of the mats. We will make a formal announcement when the grass area has been opened up. We thank you all for your patience and understanding.

The Senate held its second day of debate on the background checks plan forged by Democrat Joe Manchin of West Virginia and Republican Pat Toomey of Pennsylvania, but no vote was scheduled.

Topic.Title: ON OLDBAMA'S WATCH MULTIPLE DOMESTIC TERROR ATTACKS HAPPENED

Message.Msg: You should be ashamed of yourself.

Topic.Title: WHEN ASKED about the Boston Bombing Hillary replied

Message.Msg: Yeah, scream it LOUD from the mountaintops of this Yahoo CSCO message board LOL! (And then wonder why the GOP is in a free fall...

Message.Title: Join our coalition to stop Pressure Cooker Violence
Message.Msg: Let's put a limit to how many nails can be bought and kick grandma out of the kitchen. She doesn't need that pressure cooker. Send the kids to eat at McDonalds and spend spend spend helping Bernanke to drive the DOW higher and increasing the need for government healthcare. Only the government should have pressure cookers for the good of the people! Let's make a plea to Obama to buy up all the nails and pressure cookers for Homeland Security use. We'll all eat our peas but we don't need to cook them in a pressure cooker for the good of societ, It's only FAIR that way!
